SEARCH
Package app.user

Class HumanPlayer

java.lang.Object
app.user.Player
app.user.HumanPlayer
public class HumanPlayer extends Player
HumanPlayer represents a user who is playing the game. It extends the Player class and provides functionality for human interaction in the game. The human player is instantiated when a user chooses to play in either SinglePlayerController or MultiplayerController. The human player has the following features: 1. A bankroll for betting in the game 2. A wager system for placing bets 3. Interactive methods for playing cards and managing the hand

    • HumanPlayer

      public HumanPlayer(String name, List<Card> cards)
      Creates a new human player with the specified name and starting hand. Initializes the bankroll to 1000.
      Parameters:
      name - The player's name
      cards - The initial hand of cards

  • Method Details

    • displayHand

      public String displayHand()
      Returns a formatted string representation of the player's hand. Uses AsciiArt.printLine(java.util.List<app.board.Card>) to format the output.
      Returns:
      Formatted string of the player's hand

    • modifyBankroll

      public void modifyBankroll(double change)
      Modifies the player's bankroll by the specified amount. Positive values increase the bankroll, negative values decrease it.
      Parameters:
      change - The amount to change the bankroll by
